title: Professional Services play major part in Leicester Business Festival - Leicester Mercury

organizations.name: marketing and business support, food & drink

text:
Professional Services play major part in Leicester Business Festival “Recent events have made Leicester and Leicestershire a truly exciting place to do business." Share Comments 
Professional Services is a dominant sector in the Business Festival with 24 events taking place over the fortnight. Events cover selling or passing on a business, legal basics for SMEs; wealth management and commercial mediation seminars, to managing tax, dealing with Brexit and scary issues that can affect Family or Small to Medium Enterprises. 
Scott Charlish, Head of Financial Planning at Brewin Dolphin East Midlands is the sector lead for Professional Services. He said, “I am delighted to be associated with the Leicester Business Festival 2017. Scott Charlish, LBF Professional Services Sector Lead 
“Recent events have made Leicester and Leicestershire a truly exciting place to do business. I firmly believe that the financial and professional services community are very well placed to play our part in the further development of the area which in my view has become one of the most exciting places to conduct business in the UK.” 
There are over 150 events taking place during the Leicester Business Festival this year, with everything from conferences, seminars, workshops, trade shows to exhibitions, award ceremonies and recruitment fairs taking place. Read More Record number of marketing and business support events planned for Leicester Business Festival 2017 
Most events are free and open to absolutely anyone in the world to attend. 
Events span a huge spectrum of legal, financial and business services, and are all put on by organisations from across Leicestershire to address common issues experienced by micro business owners and SMEs in particular. 
All the events are part of the Leicester Business Festival sponsored by Leicester Castle Business School. The Business Festival is an annual, two-week ‘festival’ of free business events covering a variety of sectors including Professional Services, Marketing and Business Support, Food & Drink, Sport and Health, Tourism and Hospitality, Creative Industries and many more. 
The Festival is the first of its kind to be run in the UK and now in its third year, it is by far the largest business event in the region. 
All the events are completely free to attend but places must be booked in advance via the Business Festival website. 
For more details and tickets, visit www.leicesterbusinessfestival.com Read More
